author: Pruthvi-ch
body:
PR description:

Update the hgcalcell xml and plugin files in view of corrections for cell dimension. The new code will take care of the V17 cells but is not expected to modify cells for earlier version.
Depends on PR #37448
Discussed in : https://indico.cern.ch/event/1136462/

PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Cell correction
